argSrc: Intelligence services should be more closely regulated by parliament,
argTrg: for, as the most recent NSA wiretapping scandal has shown, the federal state government is allegedly not always familiar with the scope of operations of its intelligence services.

argSrc: Intelligence services should be more closely regulated by parliament,
argTrg: Checks could contribute to restricting the so far rather opaque scope of action of individual services.

argSrc: Intelligence services should be more closely regulated by parliament,
argTrg: Yet it remains questionable whether the actual implementation of such supervision would at the same time lead to a stronger observance of laws,

argSrc: Intelligence services should be more closely regulated by parliament,
argTrg: as ultimately this decision is in the hands of the respective government leaders.
